member.name: T:LingDev.EntityFrameworkCore.Audit.AuditOptions
member.summary: Options to configure the behavior of audited entities.

member.name: P:LingDev.EntityFrameworkCore.Audit.AuditOptions.AllowAnonymousCreate
member.summary:
Whether to allow anonymous creation of audit entities, default to .
An will be thrown when anonymous creation, you can use to specify anonymous operations that entities can perform.
If , it will allow anonymous creation for all audit entities.

member.name: P:LingDev.EntityFrameworkCore.Audit.AuditOptions.AllowAnonymousModify
member.summary:
Whether to allow anonymous modification of audit entities, default to .
An will be thrown when anonymous modification, you can use to specify anonymous operations that entities can perform.
If , it will allow anonymous modification for all audit entities.

member.name: P:LingDev.EntityFrameworkCore.Audit.AuditOptions.AllowAnonymousDelete
member.summary:
Whether to allow anonymous deletion of audit entities, default to .
An will be thrown when anonymous deletion, you can use to specify anonymous operations that entities can perform.
If , it will allow anonymous deletion for all audit entities.

member.summary: Saves all changes and audit logs to the database.
